feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: Fathom, struck with the description, soon perceived how this woman’s disease might be converted to his advantage...

causedByEvent.name: Description of the old gentlewoman's behavior

feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: Fathom, stung with these accusations, which he really did not deserve, replied with uncommon heat...

feels.name: Remorse
feels.quote: These reflections, which, perhaps, the misery of his fellow-creatures would never have inspired, were now produced from the sensation of his own calamities...

feels.name: Filial Affection
feels.quote: He pressed the little image to his lips with the most filial fervour...

causedByEvent.name: Receiving a miniature picture of his father

feels.name: Indignation
feels.quote: At sight of this apparition, the blood mounted into Renaldo’s cheeks, and his eyes began to lighten with eagerness and indignation...
